tool.name: Search ChemBL database
tool.description: for compounds which are similar to a SMILES string

param.name: format
param.label: SMILES input type
param.help: Enter SMILES as either text or file.

param.name: smiles
param.label: Input file
param.help: File containing a single compound in SMILES format. Note only the first line of the file will be read, if the file contains multiple compounds.

param.name: type
param.label: Search type
param.help: Search for compounds are similar to the SMILES input, or which contain the SMILES input as a substructure

param.name: tanimoto
param.label: Tanimoto cutoff score
param.help: Score for similarity search. Minimum value is 70.

param.name: drugs
param.label: Filter to return only approved drugs

param.name: biotherapeutic
param.label: Filter to return only biotherapeutic molecules

param.name: natprod
param.label: Filter to return only natural products

param.name: ro5
param.label: Filter for Lipinski's Rule of Five

tool.help:
Search the ChemBL database for compounds which resemble a SMILES string. Two search options are possible: similarity (searches for compounds which are similar to the input within a specified Tanimoto cutoff) and substructure (searches for compounds which contain the input substructure).
Results can be filtered for compounds which are 1) approved drugs 2) biotherapeutic 3) natural products and 4) fulfil all of the Lipinski rule of five criteria.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Input**
A single molecule in SMILES format. This can be submitted either as text or as a file containing the SMILES string on the first line. Note that if the file contains multiple lines, only the SMILES string on the first line will be used for the search.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
A SMILES file with search results, each on a new line.
